section.p: In releases prior to CCA 4.1.0 and for installations without CPACF support this verb requires the MDC Generate command (offset X'008A') to be enabled in the active role. This command is no longer required in CCA 4.1.0 when CPACF clear-key function is available (KM, function 1), and enabled for CCA use (environment variable CSU_HCPUACLR is set to '1', the default value).
The user must enable the MDC Generate command with a Trusted Key Entry (TKE) workstation before using this verb.
